reviewText: This movie is almost impossible to find on VHS.  If anyone has one they don't want, they should list it.  It would sell.

Is this a great movie?  Well no, but it's a fun movie, and definitely one to enjoy on a hot summer day, just like I did back in the early 80's when I caught this movie on HBO.  If you're a fan of Tony Danza or Orangutans, then this movie is for you.  The orangutans steal the movie, as well as the goofy, madcap villains trying to steal them.  An absolute treat from start to finish.

If you want to see Tony Danza in his prime and in all his sexiness then this movie is for you.  Even if you don't find it funny you can lust over a young Tony Danza as he wears tight t-shirts that show off his sexy muscles.  Stallone called himself the "Italian Stallone" but Tony Danza was my crush growing up.  He was tall, dark, and handsome!!! The big bonus is that there is a scene wear you can see Tony running around in his tighty whities (yeah remember those days?).  I only wish they had this on DVD.  $35-45 is a little too much to see some beef cake. Somebody put this on YouTube.com.

I ordered this VHS tape because I have been looking for it forever! Although it's no Oscar winner it brings back lots of memories for my siblings and I! The sound quality was eh but the tape is very old! I am happy with the seller and my purchase!!!
To not by this movie is a tragedy!  It's fantastic!!!!  Love Maxa!  hahahaha

Loved this crazy flick when I was a kid. (I'm 40 now). None of my friends have seen this movie. It's not cinematic gold but I think there's a few laughs to be had. Plus seeing a very young Tony Danza and Danny Devito was nostalgic.

Is this a DVD with a case for going ape
I don't want a VHS tape
Message me back and if it's a DVD I'll purchase it thanks
This movie is the hilarious movie from the eighties brings back old later

This movie changed my life. Soon after watching i bought an orangutan and moved him in with me.  I taught him to drive and smoke cigarettes.  We are both planning on voting Trump in the 2016 presidential election. Thanks GOING APE!
Very funny movie but no dvd.

Good family comedy with twists and turns. Good  acting from two very good actors ( Tony Danza and Danny DeVto )  And who doesn't love a group of highly intelligent & mischievious  monkeys.  A movie  that is entertaining  and  does not need to be edited for children.
Some movies not as good as they seemed at first view. This is one of them. A few weak laughs from the animals antics, but really lame story and Danny DeVito is obnoxious and not funny at all.
